DOC.brief_title: Ispinesib In Combination With Capecitabine In Patients With Solid Tumors
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Histologically cytologically confirm diagnosis advance solid tumor malignancy responsive standard therapy standard therapy . ECOG ( Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ) Performance Status 02 . Bone marrow function : ANC great 1500/mm3 . Platelet count great equal 100,000/mm3 . Hemoglobin great 9 g/dL . Renal function : Calculated creatinine clearance great equal 50 mL.min . Total bilirubin great 1.5 mg/dL . AST/ALT le 2.5 X upper limit normal . Exclusion criterion : Females pregnant nursing . Preexisting hemolytic anemia . Preexisting peripheral neuropathy great equal grade 2 . Known deficiency dihydropyrimidine dehydrogenase ( DSD ) .
